title: CIO India &ndash; July 2014
description:
CIO India Ã¢â‚¬â€œ July 2014
 English | 68 pages | PDF | 35,4 MB

CIO.in is a trusted, interactive, community destination for Indian CIOs and other high-level IT executives to connect on key issues and business challenges.  Its three pronged approach of blending editorial content, solution  provider content and user-generated content makes CIO.in a critical resource for CIOs for taking informed purchase decisions.

CIO.in is built on preferences of Indian CIOs both in terms of content types and formats. It is designed to optimize the time of CIOs while enabling them to delve deep into their specific interest with quick, easy, search and navigation options.


Key Sections

Case Studies: CIOs find great value in stories that showcase how their peers at other organizations have leveraged IT innovatively to achieve their business goals. Case studies not only helps them identify all the challenges that one can expect during IT implementations but also exposes them to the solutions that helped overcome those challenges. CIO.in features a rich repository of case studies from a wide range of industries involving various technologies.

White  Paper Library: When it comes to gaining understanding of a particular technology, whitepapers are the best resource. They don't just provide in-depth information on products or solutions, but also play a significant role when it comes to justifying the purchase. CIO.in features an extremely rich White Paper Library, housing hundreds of whitepapers on a wide range of technologies and topics. Aided with an advanced search mechanism, readers can find the relevant whitepapers conveniently.

Solution Centers: A Solution Center houses multiple microsites embedded within CIO.in each providing in-depth information about a particular technology solution. This provides CIOs with a single point destination for resources such as whitepapers, case studies and product information, all compiled under one roof.

CIO TV: Video content is fast gaining popularity and provide an highly engaging and interesting environment to learn about new technologies and updates. CIO.in features a dedicated section for video content. Titled CIO TV, this section will feature content like IDG Tech World Update and interviews among many others.
